verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: Lil’ Kim] [V: meets] [ARG1: Littler Trump] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] . Not only does Trump ’s courting of North Korea ’s despot Kim give him legitimacy , but it shows how degraded and simple minded Trump has made the US look.</p >
